summary: The Tensa Zangetsu Sword from Bleach.
descriptionHtml:
The Tensa Zangetsu Sword from Bleach.

I know there already are mods like this,
but this is a mod ive done on my own, and already uploaded on Steam Workshop earlier.

Its a simple sword:
[List]
[*]Craftable
[*]Improvable
[*]In both 1- and 2-handed versions
[/List]

[youtube]By8WAaPww1M[/youtube]

Available on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=14958]Steam WS[/url] too!

I hope you like it, have fun!

Now a little monolouge of mine:
I think it's a bit mean of you guys, blaming me that my mods aren't the best ones available in the whole world.
I got like 50 messages of people that said "Oh, your version of Tensa is so bad, all people should only download this one *link*, it's much better." ...
I don't have anything against people, that link to other (better) versions of this sword, because it got some more features or better textures or anything, but why do you have to speak ill of my mod??
You people should thank me for sharing my mod that I originally made for a friend. I'm not getting paid for this, and there's a whole bunch of people that like my mods and use them, so if you don't like it, share your opinion in the comment section, but stop flaming it.
Cheers.
author: LordStuff
